ability1.name: Stim Beacon
ability1.description: Deploy a beacon that grants RapidFire to all players near it.

ability2.name: Incendiary
ability2.description: Launch an incendiary grenade that deploys a damaging field of fire.

signature.name: Sky Smoke
signature.description: Use your map to call in smokescreens that obscure vision.

ultimate.name: Orbital Strike
ultimate.description: Call in a devastating orbital strike that pulses for high damage over several seconds.

ability1.name: Blaze
ability1.description: Cast a flame wall that blocks vision and damages anyone passing through it.

ability2.name: Curveball
ability2.description: Cast a flare orb that moves in a curve, bursting into a blinding flash.

signature.name: Hot Hands
signature.description: Throw a fireball that explodes after a delay or upon impact, dealing damage to enemies and healing you.

ultimate.name: Run It Back
ultimate.description: Mark your current location. If you die during the ability's duration, you'll be reborn at the marked location with full health.

ability1.name: Barrier Orb
ability1.description: Conjure a large, solid wall. Right-click to rotate the wall before casting.

ability2.name: Slow Orb
ability2.description: Cast out a radianite orb that breaks into a slowing field upon impact with the ground.

signature.name: Healing Orb
signature.description: Heal an ally or yourself to full health over a few seconds.

ultimate.name: Resurrection
ultimate.description: Target a friendly corpse. After a short delay, revive them with full health.

ability1.name: Shock Bolt
ability1.description: Fire an explosive bolt that emits a damaging pulse of static energy upon impact.

ability2.name: Owl Drone
ability2.description: Deploy a pilotable drone that can fire a dart to reveal enemies.

signature.name: Recon Bolt
signature.description: Fire a bolt that deploys a sonar emitter, revealing nearby enemies.

ultimate.name: Hunter's Fury
ultimate.description: Fire up to three deadly energy blasts that spear across the entire map, dealing damage and revealing enemies.

ability1.name: Snake Bite
ability1.description: Fire a projectile that explodes into a pool of damaging acid.

ability2.name: Poison Cloud
ability2.description: Throw a gas emitter that you can reactivate to create a toxic cloud.

signature.name: Toxic Screen
signature.description: Deploy a line of gas emitters that can be reactivated to create a wall of toxic gas.

ultimate.name: Viper's Pit
ultimate.description: Create a large cloud that reduces vision range and maximum health of enemies inside it.

ability1.name: Trapwire
ability1.description: Place a stealthy tripwire between two walls. Triggering enemies are restrained and revealed for a short time.

ability2.name: Cyber Cage
ability2.description: Throw a remote activation trap that, when triggered, creates a zone that blocks vision and slows enemies.

signature.name: Spycam
signature.description: Place a remote camera that can fire a tracking dart at enemies.

ultimate.name: Neural Theft
ultimate.description: Extract information from a dead enemy, revealing the location of all living enemies.

ability1.name: Leer
ability1.description: Summon an ethereal eye that Nearsights all enemies who look at it.

ability2.name: Devour
ability2.description: Consume a Soul Orb to rapidly heal for a short duration.

signature.name: Dismiss
signature.description: Consume a Soul Orb to become intangible for a short duration.

ultimate.name: Empress
ultimate.description: Enter a heightened state of frenzy, increasing firing speed, reload speed, and healing upon kills.

ability1.name: Nanoswarm
ability1.description: Throw a grenade that, upon activation, deploys a swarm of nanobots dealing damage.

ability2.name: Alarmbot
ability2.description: Deploy a bot that hunts down enemies, applying a debuff that causes them to take increased damage.

signature.name: Turret
signature.description: Deploy a turret that fires at enemies in a 180-degree cone.

ultimate.name: Lockdown
ultimate.description: Deploy a device that detains all enemies caught in its radius after a long windup.

ability1.name: Flashpoint
ability1.description: Fire a fast-acting flashbang through a wall. The burst blinds all players looking at it.

ability2.name: Fault Line
ability2.description: Equip a seismic blast. Hold fire to increase the distance. Release to set off a quake that dazes all players in its zone.

signature.name: Aftershock
signature.description: Fire a slow-acting burst through a wall to deal high damage.

ultimate.name: Rolling Thunder
ultimate.description: Send a cascading quake through all terrain in a large cone. The quake dazes and knocks up everyone it touches.

ability1.name: Shrouded Step
ability1.description: After a delay, teleport a short distance.

ability2.name: Paranoia
ability2.description: Send out an ethereal shadow in a straight line, Nearsighting anyone it touches.

signature.name: Dark Cover
signature.description: Cast out a stealthed ethereal orb that bursts into an obscuring sphere.

ultimate.name: From the Shadows
ultimate.description: Select anywhere on the map to teleport and reform. You will appear as a Shade that can be killed by enemies to cancel the teleport.

ability1.name: Cloudburst
ability1.description: Throw out a cloud of fog that obscures vision on impact.

signature.name: Tailwind
signature.description: Dash a short distance in the direction you're moving.
